mapper.select: SELECT sr.* FROM sys_role sr LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sr.role_id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON sur.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE 1 = 1 ${params.data_scope}
select * from sys_dept d left join sys_role_dept rd on rd.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = rd.role_id where r.role_id = #{roleId}
SELECT r.* FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON r.role_id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON sur.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.del_flag = '0' and sur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.sql: select distinct r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.sort, r.data_scope, r.menu_check_strictly, r.dept_check_strictly, r.status, r.del_flag, r.create_time from sys_role r left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = r.role_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = sur.user_id left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id
